product_name: Pearl Izumi Select LTD Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Select LTD bike jersey brings fresh color and energy to the design of a high-performance cycling top. Moisture-transfer fabric moves sweat to outer surface for quick evaporation and breathes for proper thermal regulation. Fabric provides UPF 40+ protection from harmful solar rays. Generous 12 in. zipper for venting; Elasticized gripper on back keeps hem in place. 3 back pockets hold cycling essentials. The Pearl Izumi Select LTD bike jersey has a semifitted design to enhance performance and prevent fabric from flapping in slipstream.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi Select LTD bike jersey brings fresh color and energy to the design of a high-performance cycling top.
